entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued January 27 at 1:09PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rises expected on many rivers and streams for the next few days... Recent rains and warmer temperatures in the mountains have increased snowmelt and water levels are already rising on rivers and streams. Rises are expected to peak Sunday or Sunday night then begin decreasing. Areas affected include the Cascades, eastern Oregon mountains, the Grande Ronde Valley and the Blue Mountain Foothills.

entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued January 27 at 1:09PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rises expected on many rivers and streams for the next few days... Recent rains and warmer temperatures in the mountains have increased snowmelt and water levels are already rising on rivers and streams. Rises are expected to peak Sunday or Sunday night then begin decreasing. Areas affected include the Cascades, eastern Oregon mountains, the Grande Ronde Valley and the Blue Mountain Foothills.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest; Northwest Blue Mountains; Upper Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest
